text: Form Activity Motion is a remix EP by the Boston electronic band Freezepop, released online on November 11, 2008.A physical CD was released on January 27, 2009. The EP has remixes of previous songs along with one new track, "Moons of Jupiter". ==Track listing== Additionally, Freezepop released the music video for their song "Frontload" with the release of Form Activity Motion with download of the album.Releases ==References== == External links== * Freezepop.net Category:Freezepop albums Category:2008 EPs Category:2008 remix albums Category:Remix EPs Category:Electropop remix albums
title: Form Activity Motion
